text: fja't 'ihda almratyn alltyn sqa lahuma tasir 'iilayh fi hya', qalt: 'iina 'abi yadeuk lyetyk 'ajr ma saqayt lna, fmda musaa maeaha 'iilaa abyha, falamaa ja' abaha wqss ealayh qssh mae fireawn wqwmh, qal lah abwha: la takhaf najawt min alqawm alzalmyn, wahum fireawn wqwmh; 'iidh la sultan lahum bardna
